CN.content:
Please identify the "Material Name" entities in the following paragraph.

Paragraph: 4a-i For the designing high power conversion efficiency donor polymers , the following three points should be considered : 5 ( 1 ) the polymer should have appropriate highest occupied molecular orbital ( HOMO ) and lowest unoccupied molecular orbital ( LUMO ) energy levels for harvesting as more photons as possible from solar radiation ; 5b ( 2 ) the polymer / PCBM blend films should have high and balanced carrier mobility for generating more free charge carriers and efficiently collecting them at corresponding electrodes ; 6 ( 3 ) the polymer should be soluble in common organic solvent for solution processing.

Let's think step by step.

1. The first material name entity in the paragraph is "donor polymers" in the sentence "For the designing high power conversion efficiency donor polymers...".
2. The second material name entity is "PCBM" in the sentence "the polymer / PCBM blend films should have high and balanced carrier mobility...".
3. The third material name entity is "organic solvent" in the sentence "the polymer should be soluble in common organic solvent for solution processing."
Please remove irrelevant entities and only keep the entities that clearly refer to Material Name.

1. Donor polymers
2. PCBM
3. Organic solvent

These are the three material name entities in the paragraph.

Please present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Material Name".

Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

| Material Name |
| --- |
| Donor polymers |
| PCBM |
| Organic solvent |

PV.content:
Please identify the "Property Value" entities in the following paragraph.

Paragraph: 4a-i For the designing high power conversion efficiency donor polymers , the following three points should be considered : 5 ( 1 ) the polymer should have appropriate highest occupied molecular orbital ( HOMO ) and lowest unoccupied molecular orbital ( LUMO ) energy levels for harvesting as more photons as possible from solar radiation ; 5b ( 2 ) the polymer / PCBM blend films should have high and balanced carrier mobility for generating more free charge carriers and efficiently collecting them at corresponding electrodes ; 6 ( 3 ) the polymer should be soluble in common organic solvent for solution processing.

Let's think step by step.

1. "highest occupied molecular orbital (HOMO)" - HOMO energy level of the polymer
2. "lowest unoccupied molecular orbital (LUMO)" - LUMO energy level of the polymer
3. "high and balanced carrier mobility" - mobility of charge carriers in the polymer/PCBM blend films
4. "organic solvent" - solvent in which the polymer should be soluble for solution processing.
Please remove irrelevant entities and only keep the entities that clearly refer to Value of Material Property.

1. "HOMO" - energy level of the polymer
2. "LUMO" - energy level of the polymer
3. "high and balanced carrier mobility" - mobility of charge carriers in the polymer/PCBM blend films.

Please present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Property Value".

Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

| Property Value |
| --- |
| HOMO |
| LUMO |
| high and balanced carrier mobility |
